text: Python is an interpreted, high-level programming language with dynamic semantics. It emphasizes code readability and developer productivity.
FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance) Python web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.
FAISS is a library for efficient similarity search and clustering of dense vectors. It is commonly used for nearest neighbor search in embeddings.
Docker is a platform for packaging applications into containers for consistent deployment across environments.
An API endpoint is a URL exposed by a web server that accepts requests and returns responses, often used in microservices architecture.
